author: Hanry Yang
comment: Sometimes a simple app is the best app. This app delivers on exactly what it is meant to do. And it does so very well. The full compatibility with android wear is also a killer feature. One feature I would love to see is the ability to create a custom spinner where 2 or more options can spun. Something silly like inputting your favorite four pizza places and letting decidr decide for you where to order from. I think that would be a fun addition to this app.
title: Great app

author: Sterlin Ruther
comment: If you have a difficult time making decisions, this app is all you will ever need. Not only does it come with more options than anything out there, but it's free and works on my smart watch (Huawei). 5☆!
title: The Ultimate Decision Assistant

author: I am
comment: This app is awesome. I love how it has a simple layout. And it helps you with the toughest choices! Though I'd still not reccomend this for choices that could change your life, such as if you're going to break up. But it's good for simple things, such as deciding which clothes you wear.
title: A very good decision maker.

author: Brenton Colling
comment: This little app is so useful in those situations where nobody wants to make a decision. Visually, Decidr is nice on the eyes and performs well; I'm particularly fond of being able to use it on my Moto 360 Smartwatch.
title: Is it good? Decidr says yes.

author: marc focker
comment: Read the reviews,.hmmm...         Kinda made it more interesting on my part. I just need to be totally 'DECIDED" if i have to keep this app & add those couple more stars to give it a 5*rating.. or if i should hit Uninstall..  As for now, let me keep those stars.
title: ..undecidedly Optimistic!

author: Jesse Kreis
comment: I liked it a lot at first, but then I realized that the app developer made no effort for a randomizing algorithm or anything. I got heads 86 times in a row.. The ones where there are only two options just don't work well.
title: Nice UI. Predictable outcome.

author: Morgan Jackson
comment: Having trouble making a decision, and want to leave it up to chance? Impromptu party games? Magic 8 ball too big to fit in your pocket? Look no further!  But seriously, it's simple, looks great and works well.
title: Exactly what it says

author: Derek Antosiek
comment: It does what I want that's for sure. But spin the bottle is the only one on Android Wear that doesn't vibrate violently. I wish they all were like that. These watches don't have the best battery life and I don't see the need for all the vibrations.
title: Pretty useful

author: Nick Parker
comment: Does exactly what it says it does in a well designed way. But not being able to shake my phone on the Magic eight Ball screen to get an answer, just seems like a missed opportunity for some old school magic 8-ball goodness.
title: Simple and effective

author: theycallemSavage
comment: The settings button on my Note 2 doesn't work. And I can't get it on my gear live as well. I would use this app  if it were on my wearable device.
title: A couple things don't work.

author: Pim Vermeyden
comment: I do wish that it had more options available. Even the ability to "roll dice" or something similar would be fantastic.  Otherwise it's rather well designed and mostly intuitive.
title: Great, but limited

author: Tyler Austen
comment: I love this app, it's entertaining and useful all at one, but it's always bugged me that I have to download a separate app for dice rolls, it would be cool to have that feature available with all the other stuff this app does.  Still 5 stars though because this app is just that good!
title: Why no dice?

author: human being
comment: I dont want vibration when i do somthing,add a setting system
title: Put a setting in the app

comment: Very simple app. Very easy to look at. It would be nice if you could turn off vibration on your phone/wear device because that can use a lot of battery, but I'll probably use it all the time.
title: Awesome

author: Stephen Moss
comment: Cannot say start decidr as Google now only picks up decider therefore still quite manual to start up on watch
title: Can't start from smart watch

author: Thomas Rabe
comment: Settings button doesn't work, so no advanced functions. But beautifully simple interface and basic functions work fine.
title: Needs update

author: Giovonni Fareed
comment: Bug: When I click on Settings it does nothing
title: Awsome app!

author: David Hathaway
comment: Like another suggested, letting us add custom games (pizza, Chinese, burgers) would make it perfect.
title: Good for what it does

comment: What a great idea... Decidr actually makes indecision fun! Should you download? YES!!
title: Fun and useful!

author: Thai Nguyen
comment: It will be better if you let us edit the answer or add more launguages with Google Tranlate.
title: So cool

author: Hussame Curtis
comment: If you can bring up "online mode" : you create an account,play with your friend… it would be a great thing to see from you guys ! (just my idea)

author: Javon Evans
comment: Theirs nothing to complain about...  Love that android wear support 👌...  Dice would be nice!!!
title: It's just so good!

author: danny tsang
comment: How do you access this on android wear?!?!
title: Confused

author: ManiDeep M
comment: Adding Custom options would make much more sense
title: Simple and nice

author: Black Crystal
comment: This app has settled many an argument.. 5 stars !
title: Settles it

author: Ranjan Harris
comment: This app is great for when you can't make up your mind. Has everything I'd even want all in one place.
title: Very handy

author: Shane Kelly
comment: Great App, but an option to disable vibrate would be useful, in addition to a dice.
title: Simple and handy

comment: Interface is so simple and beautiful. I loved this app.
title: Glad I downloaded this

author: Mike Simpson
comment: I don't want three versions of a binary option. I want different dice or a 1 in 10 chance.
title: Great design, needs more options though

author: Shoofle Munroe
comment: How do you activate the android wear? What does the "settings" button in the menu do? Why doesn't the developer have a website? No one knows...
title: Well...

author: Mattaniah Beezy
comment: Doesn't work on lg g watch

author: Matt Chamberlain
comment: Maybe add a few more deciders or options to hide deciders you don't want. Other than that its really great.
title: Elegant

author: Tangent Tang
comment: The UI design is beautiful, simple, and easy to use. A dice feature would make this app even better.
title: Great interface design.

author: Michael Rios
comment: Does what it says, and is sleek!
title: Very cute app!

author: Matthew Taylor
comment: Needs a dice roller to make it complete
title: Great

author: Hatsy Rei
comment: Cannot enter settings. No response given when pressed.
title: Just one bug.

author: 莊天明
comment: 希望可以设置为Android wear的表盘
title: 最佳生产力辅助工具

author: Chris Loft
comment: Helps me get drunk.

author: mandy 3004
comment: Great does what it says nice design

author: Siddarth V
comment: Minimal feel, smooth UI. Thanx a ton! Try adding the Widget option.
title: PERFECT
